## Vein Package

**V**ehicular **E**missions **IN**ventory **(VEIN)** model.  

Read the DESCRIPTION file. You need several packages to run **vein**.

- sp
- raster
- rgdal
- rgeos

Also, if you want to properly run the demo, needs these:

- ggplot2
- DiagrammeR
- RColorBrewer


```{r eval=F}
library(devtools)
install_github("ibarraespinosa/vein")
demo("VEIN")
```
